mainSequence.step: Camp Management System retrieves all camper profiles from Camper Profile Database
Camper Profile Database sends Camper Details to Camp Management System
Camp Management System sends Camper Details to Nametag Generator
Nametag Generator sends generated Nametags to Camp Management System
Camp Management System sends Nametags for printing to Printer
Printer acknowledges printing to Camp Management System
Camp Management System sends confirmation and status to Administrator
